name: Elizabeth Mullen
text: Fairhope pizza hut is amazing. On time as always and super yummy. My toddler loves only pizza hut. He turned 3 today cant have a party and so he said he wanted pizza hut. They showed up with a smile and it truly made his birthday special. …More

name: Victory Reliable Services, LLC
text: Good place to eat, we love the inexpensive "all you can eat lunch buffet", fair staff keep buffet line assorted with hot pizzas, pasta, bread sticks, etc. Salad bar and fountain drinks with refills are also a good complement to a full meal. …More

name: Patricia Carter
text: Pizza hut is great!! I come with my friends for the lunch special..under $5 if you get a drink. They have so many types of pizza, all cut for you, and piping hot. Lots of stringy mozzarella, mmmmmmmm! Delicious! Buffalo chicken pizza, …More

name: Preston Melton
text: This is just about the best Pizza Hut location ever!  The staff is knowledge and considerate.  The delivery drivers are professional, polite, and make sure my order is accurate.  This place is great for lunch, birthday parties, or just a great pizza.

name: Darrell Davidson
text: Fast and order is consistently correct.

name: M Davis
text: I usually don’t have any issues with this store. However, today was an exception I suppose. I ordered a large 2 topping pizza & cheese sticks. I ordered for delivery at 12:18 pm CST. It was 2:00 when I decided I should give the store a call …More

name: Mitch Carlson
text: Not my best experience with PH, today...Normally good pizzas and wings - but not today... …More

name: C Des
text: Tried the Fairhope Pizza Hut for the first time.  Food was below what I expected. Then I noticed on my bank statement that the cashier added $3 to my bill after I left the restaurant.

name: Patti Anderson
text: Nice employees, fresh buffet, good Pepsi, all around a nice pizza chain in Fairhope! Go eat lunch! Only 5.99 + drink!

name: Abram Bowie
text: The staff was amazingly wonderful and kind and offered a coupon to help with the price. Auburn is really sweet along with the rest of the girls and guys there.

name: Michelle Newell
text: Pizza is good and they have a nice friendly staff. I only gave them 3 stars because the buffet was small and pizzas came out slow.

name: Leonard Dinsmore
text: We Love Our Local Pizza Hut!

name: Nikki Avritt
text: Michelle is awesome. Great service!!

name: George Dodson
text: Pickup order. Gotta give them credit, the order was ready when ordered. Store was messy, floor extremely slick and pizza was soggy. Friday night's not alright for pizza at Pizza Hut.

name: Tiffany Niles
text: Not good at all

name: Brandon Potter
text: Food and service was great!

name: Anthony DePaolo
text: They have free giveaways

name: Alexis Bodfish
text: We love this Pizza Hut! It has become our go to Friday-night, pizza-night place. They cook our pizza just the way we like it and it's always hot and ready when we pick it up. Manager Jermaine always makes sure we have a great experience!

name: Sam Glisson
text: Went here with friends and sat down, was immediately accused of stealing tip money. Was not allowed to order drinks. Terrible service and below average food.

name: Liz Conway
text: Lunch buffet is one of the best deals around. This location has a decent salad bar, excellent service, does enough business that the buffet is always fresh, and offers a wide variety. For an easy, quick lunch, go!

name: Christian Mackey
text: They’ve been better lately for delivery, which I appreciate. I probably order delivery from them once a month. For a little while, the delivery person would have me retrieve items out of their warmer/carrier, but that has ceased. They seem …More

name: Shaqona Byrd
text: Real fast

name: Ruth Geraci
text: At 11:30 on a Mon. There were only 2 kinds of pizza on the buffet for at least 10 min. The first two salad bowls piled on the buffet were dirty! The place was less than half full so no excuses for lack of choices!

name: Marie Waters
text: Great service, friendly  people.good pizza and wings.

name: corey williams
text: Great place to eat..

name: Merlynn Glatfelter
text: Packed with customers. Food slow to be put out. Thirty minutes without salsd greens. Good quality. Workers doing their best. Overwhelming at noon lunch.

name: robert witt
text: Not busy at all. Great service.

text: Good pizza, good service!

text: Its pizza hut , consistant world wide. Kid friendly.

name: Lora Blair

name: Colin Moran
text: Attempted to talk to the woman on the phone while they obviously had construction or some other activities going on in the restaurant. Having asked what the specials were tonight it sounded like that was something she did not want to …More

name: Ray Reynolds
text: Gotta love Pizza Hut!

name: Deborah Gallaway
text: This place could be improved. The food was okay but some of the salad bar veggies were wilted. Our waitress rang up our ticket so it failed to register the special price on our order--a $13 overcharge.

name: Walter Geiger
text: Buffet was good, yet the buffet table was emptied by all the customers. Customers waited for next selection but disappointed by lack of quantity. $4.99 special drew in plenty, add an extra $1.99 for beverage. Those on limited time would be …More

name: D WIZ
text: Not bad for lunch! 4.99 turns into bought $10 after drink and tip! Happy eats!

name: Sunny McElrone
text: Excellent service, pizza was perfect! Crust was buttery and soft. Manager Jermaine was very friendly, server Tyrell had taken great care if us. A+

name: Anne Marie Frazier
text: The manager which is a male on tuesday night buffet is absolutely terrible! He is rude to customers and his staff. He shook his head and sighed when my kids and I were getting a peppermint at the register.He is just plain RUDE! The rest of the staff is great.

name: Robert Lee Richardson Sr.
text: Great deals and great all you can eat buffet

name: Virginia Hannahan
text: This place is terrible. I ordered a pizza for delivery and after waiting almost two hours, I checked my phone. I had two missed calls from an unknown number but there were no messages. So I call them and they tell me that they were the ones …More

name: Carol Demoss
text: Good job. Missed buffet. Maybe longer hours. Closes at 1:30

name: Cliff Wright, Sr.
text: When they got the takeout order right it was good, but that usually only happened like 3 out of 10 times so, just be sure and check your pizza before you leave the premises and be prepared to hang around or come back again once your replacement pizza is ready. Just saying, good when its all done right, the first time.

name: Serena kay
text: The staff is very friendly and helpful here

name: NokeName

name: Josh Carden
text: Ordered takeout and it wasn't quite ready. The guy who rang me up was extremely apologetic and made sure he got the order right and even deducted my bill a little bit. I was extremely pleased with the customer service!

name: David Long
text: Great food and friendly staff. Great price for the lunch buffet.

name: Randy Dillon
text: Always good food and the waitresses are always friendly.

name: Rising Halo
text: All in all great pizza and wings. Delivery is fairly prompt.

name: Tommy Turk
text: Visited the Fairhope Pizza Hut. Was a very busy place since it was lunch time. Food was very good and the service was outstanding!

name: travian Dickinson
text: Thank you to Jermaine for providing excellent customer service tonight. I really appreciate you going the extra mile.

name: Zela Jackson
text: Pizza is always good,  service is always good but they keep it so cold you had better bring a jacket.

text: Hot and fresh delicious pizza delivered sooner than expected on a night when it's below freezing and the delivery driver was still polite and professional!!!!! Everything you could hope for in a delivery service!!!!

name: William Bruce
text: We called in for delivery.  They quoted 45 minutes.  We waited an hour beyond that, and finally went out to a Mexican restaurant for dinner.  I've yet to hear from Pizza Hut delivery.  Be wary.  I'll not order again.
